elements.name: Successful addition of a new pet

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "100","Tommy","available"
I send a POST request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's details in JSON format
the pet should be added to the store's inventory

elements.name: Successful addition of a new pet

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "200","Tommy200","available"
I send a POST request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's details in JSON format
the pet should be added to the store's inventory

elements.name: Verify that a pet can be retrieved by its ID

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "300","Tommy1","available" exists
I send a POST request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's details in JSON format
User retrieves the pet details with ID "300"
The API should return a 200 OK response with the pet object that matches the "300","Tommy1","available"

elements.name: Verify that a pet can be retrieved by its ID

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "400","Tommy201","available" exists
I send a POST request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's details in JSON format
User retrieves the pet details with ID "400"
The API should return a 200 OK response with the pet object that matches the "400","Tommy201","available"

elements.name: Verify that a pet's details can be updated by its ID using PUT

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "100","Tommy1Updated","sold" exists
I send a PUT request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's updated details in JSON format
User retrieves the pet details with ID "100"

elements.name: Verify that a pet's details can be updated by its ID using PUT

steps.name: I have the details of the pet "200","Tommy201Updated","pending" exists
I send a PUT request to the "pet" endpoint with the pet's updated details in JSON format
User retrieves the pet details with ID "200"
